hero.bio: Frontend developer building high-performance web apps with Next.js and mobile apps with React Native.

projects.sectionIntro: A few projects that reflect how I work: product focus, robust design systems, and carefully crafted front-end execution.

jikowood.summary: Showcase website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB to present custom woodworking projects and collect client testimonials. The website contributed to a 17% increase in business activity over one year.

purposeSport.summary: Showcase website built with Next.js, TypeScript, for a basketball recruiting agency, featuring a dynamic and interactive image and video gallery. The platform contributed to a 3% growth in business activity over one year.
purposeSport.role: Product architecture, UX and front-end integration

maxwellJones.summary: Corporate website built with Next.js and TypeScript for a holding company. a dynamic page: strategic network. a call booking to allow clients to book a call with the consultants.
maxwellJones.role: Product strategy, UX/UI direction and front-end delivery

reactNext.title: React (Next.js)
reactNext.description: I build modern web applications using React and Next.js, focusing on performance, accessibility, and maintainable architecture. I pay close attention to component structure, state management, and user experience to create interfaces that feel fast, intuitive, and reliable.

reactNative.title: React Native
reactNative.description: I develop mobile applications that share the same level of quality and structure as web projects. My approach focuses on smooth interactions, reusable components, and clean logic so apps remain scalable and easy to maintain over time.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: I believe good development is about clarity and longevity. I prioritize simple architectures, readable code, and pragmatic decisions over unnecessary complexity. My goal is to build products that are easy to understand, easy to evolve, and built to last.

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.description: Playing basketball at a high level taught me consistency and daily commitment. Progress comes from repetition, structure, and showing up even when motivation isn't there.

competitiveness.title: Competitiveness
competitiveness.description: Competition shaped my mindset. I naturally push for better results, higher standards, and constant improvement. I don't like losing â€” and I don't stop at "good enough".

resilience.title: Resilience
resilience.description: Sport taught me how to handle pressure, setbacks, and challenges. I stay focused, adapt quickly, and keep moving forward until the goal is reached.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: I take projects seriously from the first idea to the final delivery. Being freelance taught me responsibility, autonomy, and the importance of making things work in real conditions.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Working on different projects and with different clients taught me to learn quickly and adjust to new contexts, technologies, and constraints.

execution.title: Execution
execution.description: I value action over theory. Building, testing, iterating, and delivering real products is what drives me. Ideas only matter when they become something tangible.
